channel.title: Lol?
channel.description:
---alright well i did the portforwarding stuff and i did the no-ip and the freakin firewall but and my no-ip hosts show a smiley thats blushing. And atm im running my pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0 so i went to moparscape to but it on says that my server its not online when im playing it atm ? so some1 help plz
also when this problem gets fixed up whoever helps me gets co-owner and whoever codes gets co-owner :) :P
<><><>hell0z<><><>

item.title: Lol?
item.dc:creator: @hell0z hell0z
item.description:
@hell0z wrote:

omfg

this is the story i did all that stuff about portforwarding and no-ip

and it showing up i have a server under hosts in the program duc v2.2.1

when i try to put it on server status its not running though so how come?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 02:43:13 PM[/size][hr]when i say its no running i mean it says its offline[br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 02:44:46 PM[/size][hr]and im not a freakin idiot i know 127.0.0.1 is local host and i know whats 0.0.0.0 is too -.-

i have an i.p -.-[br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 02:45:51 PM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

item.title: Lol?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Wtf i didn’t understand 1 bit of that… Learn to type in english, not like…

im running my server and went to moparscape its offline but its online… wtf u on about-.-

item.title: Lol?

item.description:
@austinh100 wrote:

get a noip and thats what other people log on to ;D
but u log on to 127.0.0.1

item.title: Lol?
item.dc:creator: @zooyork_2727 zooyork 2727
item.description:
@zooyork_2727 wrote:

0.0.0.0 is the ip YOU log on to, not the servers ip.
